fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Twice per game, pick a player, they will be controlled by the host that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will decide whats the best course of action for your team based on all the info the Host has, For example, Killing/investigative Roles will target the most valuable enemy, Protective roles will prevent a kill where possible, and so on.
- You recieve your target's feedback.
